title: Capitol Reef National Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Capitol Reef National Park strives to keep the public informed about news events which occur within the park by providing press releases to local and regional news providers, and by posting News Releases on this website.   Up-to-date information about road conditions and weather is available by calling (435)425-3791 and pressing "1" for visitor information.
